title: Invest More In Passenger Rail?
teaser: An Amtrak train derailment in Philadelphia last week killed eight passengers and injured nearly 200 others. On the day after the crash, Congress voted to cut Amtrak's proposed funding by more than $1 billion. But Joy Cardin's guest says what American passenger rail needs is more federal investment, not less, if it is to become safer and easier to use. He makes his case for the future of rail travel.
